DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Smoking Survey First Cigarette Minute Elapse Time
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The elapsed minutes from when a person wakes to smoking their first cigarette.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tobacco Smoking Survey First Cigarette Elapse Minute
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act of puffing and/or inhaling smoke from a lit cigarette, cigar, or pipe._A document used in a method of data collection that involves interviewing (or giving questionnaires to) a representative and often large group of people._Preceding all others in time or space or degree._Finely cut tobacco encased in a wrapper of thin paper and rolled for smoking._To pass by; having passed by._A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.
